text: The Ghana women's national football team is the national team of Ghana and is controlled by the Ghana Football Association. They are nicknamed the Black Queens.Early Camp For Black Queens Ahead Of Mali Tie ==History== ===Beginning=== The Ghana women's national team played its first international match... ===–present=== ==Stadium== The Ghana women's national team play their home matches on... ==Kits== ==Coaching staff== {| class="wikitable" |- !
